name: Hue Am I
description:
A gray scale loner searches for a place to belong by phasing through monochromatic worlds.

We focused on making a game in which a character changed themselves in order to see the world of others, could be learned with little instruction, and was a complete experience with a thematic ending.

Requires a keyboard, playable in browser.

Credits

  • Miko Charbonneau
  • Dale Lemieux
  • Sarah Herman
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod (www.incompetech.com)
